content.question: What is the womanâ€™s purpose for talking to Wang Jun?

choices.label: To encourage Wang Jun to sign up for a Go tournament
To tell Wang Jun the results of a recent Go tournament
To ask Wang Jun who is the best Go player at their school
To tell Wang Jun that she is too busy to participate in a Go tournament

content.answer: To encourage Wang Jun to sign up for a Go tournament

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
